originalText.text: Had my first laser appointment at the Flatiron LaserAway location today. Could not rate the staff and nurses highly enough! Everyone was so kind and welcoming, totally putting me at ease. Special shout-out to my nurse, Sam, who was super professional and and knowledgeable, walking me through the process and making it incredibly enjoyable. Canâ€™t wait for my next visit!

originalText.text:
I had an amazing experience with Laser Away for Cool Sculpting and laser hair removal services. From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel incredibly comfortable and at ease. As a first-timer, I had a lot of questions and a touch of anxiety, but they were so friendly and patient in addressing all of my concerns.

What truly stood out was the authenticity of their suggestions. They didn't try to upsell me on services I didn't need; instead, they tailored their recommendations to what would work best for me. It was clear that they genuinely cared about my experience and results.

The service itself was excellent. The nurse who performed the procedures was not only highly skilled but also an excellent communicator. She explained every step of the process, ensuring I felt informed and confident throughout.

I couldn't be happier with the results and the exceptional service I received from Laser Away. They've won me over as a loyal customer, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-notch Cool Sculpting and laser hair removal services. Thank you, Laser Away, for making me feel confident and comfortable throughout the entire journey! ðŸ˜ŠðŸŒŸ

originalText.text: The first time I went to this location I decided to do my first laser procedure in which I was very nervous! Ashley was amazing with making me feel comfortable. She was very sweet and friendly. I decided to try Juvederm lip filler and I definitely picked the perfect place.. Ashley never disappoints! She walked me through the whole process, took her time, the environment was super clean. I was nervous at first because I didnâ€™t know how it would come out.. nonetheless she did her thing! Very satisfied with my results.

originalText.text: I came to have my lip filler done and I'm very satisfied with the result. Everyone is so welcoming and nice, and the tech is super professional. I will definitely recommend friends and family comes to here for sure.

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of receiving a laser facial treatment (fire and ice) at Laser Away today, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. Ashley, Sam, and Emily provided top-notch service, making the entire process painless and comfortable. Their informative approach helped me understand each step, and their friendliness made me feel right at home. The results were simply stunning - I left with a beautiful, glowing complexion. I can't recommend Laser Away and their amazing team enough! Will definitely be back
